meanings.sent1: The raw material was refinable into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The refinable metal could be shaped into intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: She joked that even her cooking skills were refinable with practice.
meanings.sent4: His refinable manners were like a polished gem in a sea of rough behavior.
meanings.sent5: The refinable nature of the diamond made it a perfect choice for the ring.

meanings.definition: Able to be improved or made more precise.
meanings.sent1: The refinable process led to a more efficient outcome.
meanings.sent2: Her refinable skills in math helped her solve complex problems.
meanings.sent3: The refinable recipe turned out to be a delicious surprise.
meanings.sent4: His refinable strategy in chess caught his opponent off guard.
meanings.sent5: The refinable details in the painting added depth to the artwork.
